ygData.subject: An Enchanter's view of the new patch
ygData.msgSnippet: Illusion: Spirit Wolf outdoor only....... how the heck do I pull giants and such out safely (FYI, before the patch, I can run to Vox, wave at her without her
ygData.messageBody:
Illusion: Spirit Wolf outdoor only....... how the heck do I pull giants
and such out safely (FYI, before the patch, I can run to Vox, wave at
her without her attacking me while in Spirit wolf form.)????

Illusion: Werewolve Damn, this illusion is now OVER powerful. I cast
this and together with swift like the wind and had a bard sing a battle
song, I did a constant 4 attacks every 2 to 3 sec! Weap is a FSS as
usual, which has 22 delay.

Pets, damn, you can give weaps to them now! With a FS dagger, my pet was
double attack for 36-40+ dmg a pierce in 2sec which is quite near the
damage output of a magi and necro pet, after the pet downgrade for the
other 2 classes. A pair of flying swords sure looks better then a
floating sword and sheild.
